body:
I know no one cares about this but on the second chapter where they talk about the girlfriend the glasses friend says "I've dated her for three days"... that's wrong. In the raw he said " Karini tsukittemo mikka to motanna" which means "If i'm the one who's dating her, i wouldn't even last for three days" 

Again, i know no one cares but it's just bothering me.

the last 2 fucking mcs were so fucking braindead retarded scum i want them to get ntred

HOW FUCKING SHIT AT VANILLA DO YOU HAVE TO BE TO WANT ME TO WANT THEM TO BE NTR'D!?!?!?
Is it weird that I actually have a fetish for smooth and sexy armpits and thighs? But that aside, why do girls have to be ticklish in those places. T-T
